description: Touru`s sister and former Burial Doll of Kurogane. She consumed all of her life force and vanished. Aki`s death was the main reason why Tokiya and Touru wanted to destroy Second World to go to the Third World, a world where Aki exist. Kurogane Kai`s two-sword skill reminded Tokiya of Aki and he muses that is Aki trying to stop him.
name: Kitsutaka Aki
